result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nancy Ortiz Ruiz

defendant.name: Ortiz Ruiz, Nancy
defendant.address: 111 S Third St B, Colby, WI 54421

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on December 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Melissa S. Inlow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Rachel E. Pisors in court for Nancy Ortiz Ruiz appeared by video. Global resolution has been made and defense has accepted.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on October 5, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on September 29, 2022 at 09:45 am.

1:47 PM Prosecuting attorney Ellen Anderson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nancy Ortiz Ruiz appeared by video.  Attorney Rachel E. Pisors in court for Nancy Ortiz Ruiz. Interpreter Susan Rascon was sworn and appeared by video to interpret. 
Global resolution has been agreed upon. Wishes to have time to speak to Atty Ledesma to resolve all 4 cases together. 
Final pre-trial schedule for August 16, 2022 will remain.
Status conference on July 29, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

10:45 AM Prosecuting attorney Ellen Anderson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nancy Ortiz Ruiz appeared by video.  Attorney Rachel E. Pisors appeared by video for Nancy Ortiz Ruiz. Interpreter Susan Rascon was previously sworn and present to interpret. 
10:55 AM Defendant unable to connect to the zoom call. Court proceeds with hearing. Global offer was provided and needs to be discussed. Defense request another status hearing.
Status conference scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Status conference on July 6, 2022 at 10:45 am.

02:00 PM Attorney Ellen Anderson appeared on behalf of the State and Defendant, Nancy Ortiz Ruiz, appeared with Attorney Rachel E. Pisors.   Interpreter Enrique Soria was sworn and present to interpret. Defense requested another status for further negotiations.  Status conference scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Status conference on April 28, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant is to remain alcohol free/maintaining absolute sobriety. Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcohol, and not go into places that sell alcohol except incidentally such as a grocery store, convenience store or gas station or other such place where alcohol is not sold for consumption on the premises.

11:18 AM Attorney Ellen Anderson appeared on behalf of the State and Defendant, Nancy Ortiz Ruiz, appeared with Attorney Rachel E. Pisors.   Interpreter Susan Rascon was sworn and present to interpret.   Defendant acknowledged receipt of complaint. Complaint charges read to defendant.   Defendant advised of right to an attorney.   Defendant acknowledged receipt of complaint.   The Defendant Entered a plea of not guilty.  Status conference scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Initial appearance on March 24, 2022 at 11:15 am.
